short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the levels of EEVO Character Cards listed on Magic Eden!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension, you can see the exp/level of any EEVO Character Card listed on Magic Eden. Just load up one of the listings, and the information will show up on the right.
